Articles.Content:
Add new textures to procedural fairings using Stock and Ven´s Revamps style!

Needs Procedural Fairing and Firespitter Plugin to work

DOWNLOAD

Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0

 

Edited June 12, 2016 by gilbr0ther
yes!!  this is what i'm waiting for!!  expect for more!!

Finally, have been wanting / waiting for this since PF first started.

Trying now.

Thanks.
Good addition! Would like to see normal maps added sometime in the future.

16 hours ago, FiiZzioN said:

Good addition! Would like to see normal maps added sometime in the future.

I make a normal map, but I could not put in the model, I tried to open it in unity, but not worked.

Completely overhauled version which is mostly done:
(it still contains some commented-out stuff from earlier versions of my work on it, so it's still tagged as WIP)

README.txt 

If found it uses

	TexturesUnlimited
	BasicProceduralTextures
	ProceduralFairings-ForEverything

and got patches for

	Bluedog_DB / Jso_Bdb_PF (former Jso/Bdb/PF)

to also have TexturesUnlimited PartVariants.

It does not need Firespitter anymore.


That file GameData\ProceduralFairings-ForEverything\ProceduralFairings-ForEverything.restockwhitelist
is in there as long as this PR is not merged into a release:
https://github.com/KSP-RO/ProceduralFairings-ForEverything/pull/9

I also included other just-unmerged stuff from pull requests on ProceduralFairings-ForEverything
